content: @G milestone-2-review opus 2026-01-04; N D 'Milestone 2 CONDITIONAL PASS'; N I 'A/K/T typing correct - maps shortcuts to full types'; N I 'Content-hash caching implemented - not node ID'; N I 'Edge semantic split working - next/feeds vs supports/requires'; N G 'Test Oracles NOT RUNNING' -> blocks milestone_3; N D 'Lines 95-98 print Tests Passed but never execute test functions' -> explains _5; N G 'State vector hardcoded by content string match' -> degrades v2_compliance; N D 'Lines 182-189 check node content strings instead of feeds edge targets' -> explains _7; N P 'Fix: Execute test functions before caching - fail cache if test fails'; N P 'Fix: Parse feeds edges to determine state key names'; N Q 'Is simulated LLM intentional prototype scope or oversight?'; E _1 evaluates milestone-2-report; E _2 validates forge.py; E _3 validates forge.py; E _4 validates forge.py; E _6 proves _5; E _8 proves _7; E _9 addresses _5; E _10 addresses _7; E _11 clarifies scope
